simulator.title: Compliance Simulator - AgileVizion
simulator.hero_title: Which cybersecurity regulations apply to you?
simulator.hero_text: Answer 6 questions and immediately discover which frameworks are mandatory or recommended for your organisation.
simulator.q1_label: Q1. Where is your headquarters / main activity located?
simulator.q2_label: Q2. What is your main business sector?
simulator.q3_label: Q3. What is the size of your organisation?
simulator.q3_hint: NIS 2: <50 employees AND <‚Ç¨10M = not concerned. One threshold exceeded is enough.
simulator.q4_label: Q4. Do you process personal data?
simulator.q4_hint: Name, email, phone, IP, cookies, HR data, customer files... 95% of companies = Yes
simulator.q5_label: Q5. Do you hold a financial license (AMF, ACPR, CSSF...)?
simulator.q5_hint: DORA targets exclusively regulated financial entities. The "banking/finance" sector is NOT enough without a license!
simulator.q6_label: Q6. Do you provide IT/Cloud services to clients?
simulator.q6_hint: MSP, managed services, SaaS, hosting, IT consulting...
simulator.conditional_subtitle: These questions refine your diagnostic based on your profile
simulator.q7_label: Q7. Are you an ICT provider for regulated financial entities?
simulator.q7_hint: Critical IT subcontractor for banks, insurers, SGP... ‚Üí DORA applies
simulator.q8_label: Q8. Do you host health data for THIRD PARTIES?
simulator.q8_hint: For clients (hospitals, doctors, clinics). NOT your own internal data.
simulator.q9_label: Q9. Do you store/process bank card numbers (PAN)?
simulator.q9_hint: NOT applicable if you use Stripe/PayPal without ever seeing the numbers.
simulator.q10_label: Q10. Do your clients require ISO 27001 or SOC 2?
simulator.q11_label: Q11. Do you work with the US Department of Defense (DoD)?
simulator.q11_hint: Direct contracts or subcontracting in the DoD supply chain
simulator.q12_label: Q12. Do you have critical activities requiring a business continuity plan?
simulator.q12_hint: Activities whose interruption would have a major impact on your business or clients
simulator.pdf_text: Receive a summary PDF with all regulations, sanctions and deadlines.

simulator.pdf_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
simulator.cta_text: Get a personalized audit and roadmap for your compliance.
